metadata.title: CVE-2019-9175 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before11.6.10, 11.7.x before 11.7.6, and 11.8.x before 11.8.1. It allowsInformation Exposure (issue 3 of 5).

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
